Question: The Mickey Mouse Club would continue in various incarnations in syndication and on the ____ Channel into the 1990s.
Hints: This person was a founding member of the anti-communist group Motion Picture Alliance for the Preservation of American Ideals.
Through Silly Symphonies, this person also created his most successful cartoon short of all time, The Three Little Pigs (1933).
This person declined Mintz's offer and as a result lost most of his animation staff whereupon he found himself on his own again.
